name: 01-24-2026-sacco-and-vanzetti
title: sacco and vanzetti paper
summary: This paper charts the coverage and opinions of the Sacco and Vanzetti trials from the perspective of the Michigan press to create a model of state-wide sentiment towards the two men. Coauthored with Doctor Giorgio Bertellini.
